DOC.criteria: 1. schedule ablation atypical atrial flutter paroxysmal atrial fibrillation 2. able willing give inform consent 1. implanted prosthetic , artificial , repaired cardiac valve chamber map , permanent pacemaker ICD lead chamber map , and/or hypercoagulopathy inability tolerate anticoagulation . 2. myocardial infarction within prior two month 3. cardiac surgery within prior three month 4. intracardiac thrombus 5. clinically significant tricuspid valve regurgitation stenosis 6. cerebral ischemic event prior six month 7. pregnant nursing 8. currently enrol clinical investigation
